query: Iron Horse Bicycle Classic gravel race Durango

videos.title: BIKE RACING IS BACK! (Durango Iron Horse Classic ROAD AND MTB RACE)
videos.description:
In today's vlog we head to Durango for our first REAL mass start MTB race since pre-covid. Macky will be going for the King of the Mountain title by racing both the road race on Saturday and the cross-country MTB race on Sunday. Watch to see how his fitness stacks up after a year off from racing. 

Want to help us keep making videos? Join us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/sydandmacky

Not into Patreon but still want to help? https://www.paypal.me/sydandmacky

Official Syd and Macky merch: https://teespring.com/stores/sydandmacky

Our webstore:
https://www.sydandmacky.com/store

Have questions about our bikes or camera gear? Check out our gear page:
https://www.sydandmacky.com/gear

The companies that support our racing:
Niner Bikes - http://bit.ly/ninerbikes
Vittoria - http://bit.ly/VittoriaTires (20% discount with code "sydandmacky")
Stages - http://bit.ly/3vvNBbg (20% discount will show in cart)
Lazer Helmets - https://bit.ly/LazerSport (15% discount will show in checkout)
Shimano - http://bit.ly/Shimanobike
PEARL iZUMi - http://bit.ly/PEARLiZUMi
Xpedo - http://bit.ly/xpedo 
Velo -  https://bit.ly/2LkUUjr
Fox - http://bit.ly/FoxBike

Connect with us:
https://www.instagram.com/sydandmacky/
https://www.sydandmacky.com/joinus

*Disclaimer - some of our links are affiliate links so we get a small percentage of any purchase you make. Doesn't change the price, just helps us keep making videos! Also, we're professional athletes, so many of the products we use and mention we didn't pay for.

videos.title: 360° Durango | Iron Horse Classic | Visit Durango
videos.description: Take a 360° ride with the pro cyclists during the 2021 Iron Horse Classic race in Durango, Colorado.

videos.title: 2021 Iron Horse Bicycle Classic Durango, CO
videos.description: Shot and edited by Phil Mancillas.

videos.title: Watch This Epic Battle At 11,000 feet. Iron Horse Bicycle Classic 2021 🇺🇸
videos.description:
Durango's premiere road racing event, with stars partaking like Howard Grotts, Ned Overend, Todd Wells, and Riley Amos. Enjoy the beautiful views and nice community vibes from the race.
My equipment:
ISM PN 1.0 Saddle: https://amzn.to/2STcazV
Stages Dash computer: https://amzn.to/3yPXfHa
Stages Power Meter: https://amzn.to/3fTIACa
VeloToze Shoecovers: https://amzn.to/33H0qCz
100% Sunglasses: https://amzn.to/3eM2orO
SupaCaz Bar Tape: https://amzn.to/3wGNBEM
SupaCaz Bottle Cage: https://amzn.to/34ySu6X
Pedros Multitool: https://amzn.to/3fzfuZU
Defeet Socks: https://amzn.to/2SKFnNc
Gopro Seat-Rail mount: https://amzn.to/2RkJv6f
Gopro 7 Silver: https://amzn.to/2SKUjLi

videos.title: Iron Horse Bicycle Classic race
videos.description: Cycling fans couldn’t have asked for a better lead group at the 45th Iron Horse Bicycle Classic.
videos.transcript:
yeah um honestly I didn't know what to
think coming into this race it being my
first time like I was saying um but once
we had that lead selection of Todd Ben
uh Christopher Ned and myself I started
feeling more confident um attacks were
kind of going all the way up colbank and
then all the way up mullus I put in a
few digs uh towards the top of mullus
and Christopher Ben and I got away uh
Todd and Ned were gapped off a little
bit and they came back to us over the
top um
and then I just kind of started
believing that maybe I can pull off the
win and luckily had some great likes for
the Sprint there at the end and uh I'm
glad Chris isn't more hurt it looks like
he's got a nasty Cut Above his eye but
he'll be all right he's a he's a young
professional but he's a professional you
think racing with that young
professional and and the 60-year-old met
over in the combination it was just
honestly I was thinking about that
during the race I mean it's and I was
making jokes yesterday uh with my
friends and girlfriend just about how an
18-year-old could win or 60-year-old
could win so um yeah it's really cool I
mean it's just a testament to what an
incredible Town Durango
is so Fort leis College how special is
it to you to win
this it's a great honestly it is a bit
of a surprise um I knew I have had good
form this year I've been working really
hard just thr that paying off excellent
congratulations on the race again that's
for your other guys what does it mean I
know there had been some bragging right
you had a full field of leis Skyhawks
including your coach uh have have a
little bit of bragging
R of course I mean it's it's a privilege
to win this race um they're all great
riders in their own right uh I'm a
little bit more of a climber than some
of the other guys on the team and some
of the other guys on our team you know
would have smoked the five of us in that
Sprint um but yeah luckily I had great
legs on the day congratulations thank
you very much
